item.title: Mr Robot Ctf
item.description: This is my write up on the prgress with the MR. ROT 1 CTF. Haven’t added the screenshots but they’ll be coming up shortly together with more progress. First, start with quick set up of both Kali Virtual Machine and Mr. Robot, both in Virtual Box. Now let’s get crackingâ€¦ First do a quick network discovery to determine ip address of the server. nmap -sn 192.168.56.0/24 Quick nmap host discovery without port scan to make it faster.
